data.name: Push-up
data.description: A fundamental bodyweight exercise that strengthens the chest, shoulders, and triceps
instructions: Start in a plank position with hands shoulder-width apart
Lower your body until chest nearly touches the floor
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels
Push back up to starting position

data.name: Deadlift
data.description: A fundamental compound exercise that targets the posterior chain muscles
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, barbell over mid-foot
Bend at hips and knees to grip the bar with hands outside legs
Keep chest up and back straight
Lift by extending hips and knees simultaneously
Stand tall, then lower the bar back to the floor

data.name: Plank
data.description: An isometric core exercise that strengthens the entire core and improves stability
instructions: Start in a push-up position on forearms
Keep body in a straight line from head to heels
Engage core muscles and hold position
Breathe normally while maintaining proper form

data.name: Pull-up
data.description: A challenging upper body exercise that targets the back and biceps
instructions: Hang from pull-up bar with palms facing away
Engage core and pull body up until chin clears the bar
Lower yourself slowly to full arm extension
Repeat without swinging or using momentum

data.name: Lunges
data.description: A unilateral leg exercise that improves balance and strengthens the lower body
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart
Step forward with one leg, lowering hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees
Keep front knee over ankle, not pushed out past toes
Push back to starting position and repeat with other leg

data.name: Bench Press
data.description: A classic upper body strength exercise targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps
instructions: Lie on bench with feet flat on floor
Grip barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width
Lower bar to chest with control
Press bar up until arms are fully extended
Keep shoulders back and core engaged

data.name: Mountain Climbers
data.description: A dynamic cardio exercise that combines core strengthening with cardiovascular training
instructions: Start in a plank position
Bring one knee toward chest while keeping other leg extended
Quickly switch legs in a running motion
Keep core tight and maintain plank position throughout

data.name: Burpees
data.description: A full-body exercise that combines strength training and cardiovascular conditioning
instructions: Start standing, then squat down and place hands on floor
Jump feet back into plank position
Perform a push-up
Jump feet back to squat position
Jump up with arms overhead

data.name: Dumbbell Rows
data.description: A unilateral pulling exercise that strengthens the back muscles and improves posture
instructions: Place one knee and hand on bench for support
Hold dumbbell in opposite hand with arm extended
Pull dumbbell to hip, squeezing shoulder blade back
Lower weight slowly to starting position
Complete all reps before switching sides

data.name: Jumping Jacks
data.description: A classic cardiovascular exercise that improves coordination and burns calories
instructions: Start with feet together and arms at sides
Jump feet apart while raising arms overhead
Jump back to starting position
Maintain steady rhythm and land softly

data.name: Overhead Press
data.description: A fundamental upper body exercise that builds shoulder strength and stability
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bar at shoulder level
Grip bar slightly wider than shoulders
Press bar straight up overhead until arms are fully extended
Lower bar back to shoulder level with control
Keep core tight throughout movement

data.name: Russian Twists
data.description: A rotational core exercise that targets the obliques and improves core stability
instructions: Sit on floor with knees bent and feet elevated
Lean back slightly while keeping back straight
Rotate torso from side to side
Keep core engaged throughout movement
Touch hands to floor beside each hip

data.name: High Knees
data.description: A dynamic cardio exercise that improves running form and cardiovascular fitness
instructions: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart
Run in place bringing knees up toward chest
Pump arms as if running
Maintain quick tempo and stay on balls of feet
Keep core engaged and posture upright

data.name: Tricep Dips
data.description: An effective bodyweight exercise that targets the triceps and rear shoulders
instructions: Sit on edge of chair or bench with hands gripping the edge
Slide forward off the seat with legs extended
Lower body by bending elbows until shoulders are below elbows
Push back up to starting position
Keep elbows close to body throughout movement

data.name: Wall Sit
data.description: An isometric exercise that builds leg strength and muscular endurance
instructions: Stand with back against wall, feet shoulder-width apart
Slide down wall until thighs are parallel to floor
Keep knees at 90-degree angle
Hold position while breathing normally
Keep back flat against wall

data.name: Bicycle Crunches
data.description: A dynamic core exercise that targets the abs and obliques with a cycling motion
instructions: Lie on back with hands behind head
Lift shoulders off ground and bring knees toward chest
Bring right elbow toward left knee while extending right leg
Switch sides in a pedaling motion
Keep lower back pressed to floor

data.name: Calf Raises
data.description: A simple exercise that strengthens and tones the calf muscles
instructions: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart
Rise up onto toes by lifting heels off ground
Hold briefly at the top
Lower heels back to starting position slowly
Keep body straight and core engaged

data.name: Side Plank
data.description: A unilateral core exercise that strengthens the obliques and improves lateral stability
instructions: Lie on side with forearm on ground, elbow under shoulder
Stack feet and lift hips off ground
Keep body in straight line from head to feet
Hold position while breathing normally
Repeat on other side

data.name: Glute Bridges
data.description: An effective exercise for strengthening the glutes and improving hip mobility
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent and feet flat on floor
Squeeze glutes and lift hips off ground
Create straight line from knees to shoulders
Hold briefly at top
Lower hips back to starting position

data.name: Superman
data.description: A back strengthening exercise that targets the erector spinae and improves posture
instructions: Lie face down with arms extended overhead
Simultaneously lift chest, arms, and legs off ground
Hold position briefly while squeezing back muscles
Lower back to starting position slowly
Keep neck in neutral position

data.name: Barbell Squat
data.description: A compound exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Place the barbell on your upper back
Bend knees and lower body until thighs are parallel to floor
Push through heels to return to starting position
